Must be wizard,the ability to change spells is a must.

As she is going to be a pixie,I thought rogue would be most fitting as a tumble,UMD class,but perhaps bard?

Basically she will be in a party most of the time,her tactics buff her teammate,s and get with the no-save artillery,help with lock,s i suppose for rp, and look cute!

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Well, no-save for a high-level caster is a bit of a waste of potential. However, if that is the case, you can swap the spell focus feats from one of my builds and use it as reference. You can get auto-still spell and wear a full plate, or some if not all the epic spells. Here's a link to the build:

http://nwnecbguild.44.forumer.com/boddy ... 69098.html

He focuses on 2 spellcasting schools, so there is room for many tweaks there if you get rid of the spell focus line of feats. Up to you to decide what to put in there: epic spells, expertise, great fortitude, etc..

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Dante2377
posts.content: Let me ask this - it sounds like a somewhat higher magic world, which I'm familiar with. Have the spells damage been scaled to move past their base or upped in anyway? I just ask because many higher magic worlds with lots of melee bonuses, the spells have to be scaled to provide any balance at all.
